meanings.sent1: The modelers carefully crafted a miniature city out of clay.
meanings.sent2: The modelers gathered to build a replica of the Eiffel Tower.
meanings.sent3: The modelers joked that they could make a model of the entire universe if they had enough time.
meanings.sent4: The modelers' creativity knew no bounds as they sculpted intricate designs.
meanings.sent5: The modelers' attention to detail brought their miniature world to life.

meanings.definition: A group of people who create models.
meanings.sent1: In the workshop, the modelers collaborated to construct a scale model of a ship.
meanings.sent2: The modelers worked together to replicate famous landmarks for a museum exhibit.
meanings.sent3: The modelers celebrated completing their project with a group photo.
meanings.sent4: The modelers' teamwork resulted in a stunning display of model airplanes.
meanings.sent5: The modelers' dedication shone through in their collective masterpiece.

meanings.sent1: The modelers' studio was filled with tools and materials for their craft.
meanings.sent2: Modelers enjoy the process of transforming ideas into tangible models.
meanings.sent3: The modelers' passion for modeling was evident in every piece they created.
meanings.sent4: Modelers find joy in bringing their imagination to life through modeling.
meanings.sent5: The modelers' artistry transformed simple materials into works of art.
